data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,335,300 people living in Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary: On average, 182 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
God, we pray for the believers in Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Seine-et-Marne who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Lao people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,318,893 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, help the 16,407 believers in Seine-et-Marne to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,318,893 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the county of Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,335,300.

We estimate Seine-et-Marne has 16,407 people who might know Jesus, 816,563 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 502,330 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Seine-et-Marne, Île-de-France, France into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
